p: Researchers have recently been searching for potent therapeutic agents from medicinal plants for SARS-CoV-2 infection [ 12]. Different secondary metabolites, including alkaloids, flavonoids, tannins, glycosides, lignin, and terpenes, are available from medicinal plants. Various studies have already established the function of phytochemicals in treating various infections and diseases [ 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18]. Moreover, compound isolation and further investigation of several pharmacological activities have been established as a crucial factor in drug discovery [ 19].
